message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. As the seller, I'm willing to start with a price of $900000. I think this is a fair starting point considering the product's value to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with what you're willing to accept.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $850000. Considering the product's value to me, I'm willing to meet you halfway and propose a counteroffer of $925000. I believe this is a fair compromise that still benefits both of us.

I appreciate your effort in finding a middle ground, Alice. While I understand the value of the product to you, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $875000. This amount still allows for a reasonable profit for you while staying within my budget.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $875000. Considering the product's value to me, I'm willing to make another concession and propose a counteroffer of $920000. I believe this is a fair compromise that still benefits both of us.

Thank you for your continued efforts, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $880000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $880000. Considering the product's value to me, I'm willing to make another concession and propose a counteroffer of $900000. I believe this is a fair compromise that still benefits both of us.

I appreciate your persistence in negotiating, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $890000 for the product. I hope this aligns closer to your expectations while still staying within my budget.

Thank you for your final offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $890000. Considering the product's value to me, I'm willing to make one more concession and propose a counteroffer of $915000. I believe this is a fair compromise that still benefits both of us.

Thank you for your last offer, Alice. I've given this a lot of thought, and I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $895000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations while still staying within my budget constraints.
